content:
In #18785 I introduced a user command addMorphismPropertyInstances that generates instance lemmas for MorphismPropertys satisfying certain typeclasses (the application is in #18784).

This is my first time doing acutal metaprogramming (with crucial help from @Calle SÃ¶nne) and the approaches I took probably weren't that idomatic so it would be great if some metaprogramming people can give it a look.
